name: Curse Terrain
components: V, S, M (the heart of a creature that dwelled in the area and powdered onyx worth 700 gp)
area: 1-mile radius emanting from the touched point
text: By touching the ground, you curse the land with four unnatural hazards. This functions as lesser curse terrain, but with the effects of the major perilous demesne curse (see page 145).
area_zh: 从接触的点向外弥漫半径1哩
text_zh: 透过触摸大地，你令四个超自然危机诅咒这片土地。此法术如同次级诅咒地形(lesser curse terrain)般作用，但效果是中等危险地域诅咒(见Page.145)。
